epp:phrases.epp:phrase:
Item meets at least one of the following conditions:
the deposit, discovery and access requirements are met.
there is a deposit exception.
there is an access exception and the deposit and discovery requirements are met.
there is a technical exception.
there is an 'other' exception.
Item meets all of the deposit requirements.
Item deposited within 3 months of acceptance

The item was deposited (moved from user work area to review buffer) for the first time within 3 months of being accepted for publication - or, for items accepted before April 2017, within 3 months of first online publication.
Item deposited with an Author Accepted Manuscript (AAM)
The item currently has at least an Author Accepted Manuscript (AAM) attached.
Item meets all of the discovery requirements.
The item is currently in the live archive.
Item meets all of the access requirements.
AAM accessible within 1 month of deposit/embargo end date
Embargo does not exceed maximum length
